scoringPlays.text: Damien Harris 75 Yd Run (Andy Pappanastos Kick)
Damien Harris 4 Yd Run (Andy Pappanastos Kick)
Jalen Hurts 11 Yd Run (Andy Pappanastos Kick)
Henry Ruggs III 20 Yd pass from Jalen Hurts (Andy Pappanastos Kick)
Najee Harris 4 Yd Run (Andy Pappanastos Kick)
Jordan Jones 3 Yd pass from Cole Kelley (Connor Limpert PAT failed)

videos.headline: Harris strikes quickly with huge TD
videos.description: Alabama's Damien Harris takes it 75 yards on the first play from scrimmage.

videos.headline: Jeudy gets Bama in red zone
videos.description: Jalen Hurts finds Jerry Jeudy on a 29-yard fade to the corner just outside the end zone and steps out of bounds.

videos.headline: Harris breaks in for second TD
videos.description: Damien Harris works his way outside and won't be stopped as he converts a four-yard touchdown to give Alabama the 17-0 lead against Arkansas.

videos.headline: Arkansas covers muffed punt by Bama
videos.description: Henry Ruggs III drops his second punt of the first quarter, this time recovered by the Razorbacks.

videos.headline: Hurts fires pass to Ridley for big gain
videos.description: Jalen Hurts connects with Calvin Ridley over the middle for 27 yards with precision.

videos.headline: Hurts takes it himself for Bama's 3rd TD
videos.description: Jalen Hurts rushes 11 yards for an easy touchdown extending Alabama's lead.

videos.headline: Jones makes a huge diving catch for Arkansas
videos.description: Jordan Jones extends to make the catch on a 46-yard pass from Cole Kelley.

videos.headline: Saban: 'Huge stop to end the half'
videos.description: Nick Saban likes how his team started the game, but saw the pressure mounting in the second quarter despite a 24-0 lead over Arkansas.

videos.headline: Hurts throws first interception of season
videos.description: Jalen Hurts is picked off for the first time this season by a diving Kevin Richardson II.

videos.headline: Hurts finds Ruggs for the Bama TD
videos.description: Jalen Hurts throws his first touchdown of the game to Henry Ruggs III padding the Tide's lead.

videos.headline: Harris pushes through for another TD
videos.description: Najee Harris converts a four-yard touchdown, increasing Alabama's lead to 38-3 against Arkansas.

videos.headline: Jacobs weaves his way for big gain
videos.description: Josh Jacobs collects a backward pass and takes it 33-yards into the red zone for Alabama.

videos.headline: Jones holds on to get Arkansas on the board
videos.description: Cole Kelley throws a three-yard touchdown to Jordan Jones in traffic for the Razorbacks' first score.

videos.headline: Harris, Tide start fast against Arkansas
videos.description: Alabama head coach Nick Saban and RB Damien Harris talk about the Tide's big plays in a win over the Razorbacks.

videos.headline: Alabama's defense can only get better
videos.description: Chris Fowler and Kirk Herbstreit examine Alabama's dominance over Arkansas and wonder if anyone can stop the Tide from the College Football Playoff.

videos.headline: Alabama's run game too much for Arkansas
videos.description: Alabama totals 308 yards on the ground including 125 yards and two touchdowns from Damien Harris in the Crimson Tide's 41-9 victory against the Razorbacks.
